name: Sol Hemochroma
description:
if i crushed your blood into elements, what could they do? could they carry more than a human? could they make life more than life? this is the way the world works. it only costs one and all you have to do is leave. all you have to do is close your mind. leave the world behind you and embrace the... SOL HEMOCHROMA

Piaculum Arcana: Original Soundtrack.
